title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The uniforms look neat and the classroom feels very structured. I wonder what we'll be learning today.

action: Raises hand to request permission to speak
thoughts: I should ask if we're starting with the daily pledge today. Following proper procedure shows respect for the rules and authority.
memory: Teacher moving to front of classroom
Raised hand to follow proper speaking protocol

action: Maintains raised hand while observing teacher's response to other student
thoughts: I should wait until the teacher addresses the Pledge of Allegiance question before asking about group projects. Following proper procedure is important for maintaining good standing.
memory: Waiting for teacher to respond to student question before speaking
Observing proper classroom protocol by keeping hand raised

action: Maintains raised hand while observing teacher's response to other students
thoughts: I should wait my turn and follow proper procedure. The teacher seems busy with the Pledge of Allegiance question first. I'll keep my hand raised respectfully until called upon.
memory: Maintaining proper classroom etiquette by keeping hand raised
Observing how teacher handles multiple student requests
